This is good visual proof why many still prefer the mechanical reliability of a wristwatch over the software bugs and garbage battery of a smartwatch.

Apple may brag about the tiny components in their watches, but those won't last and work for over a century. A wristwatch will. While the latest Apple Watch becomes a relic of decades past, (similar to how we see a Commodore 64 today), a mechanical wristwatch, if taken care of, can look and function just as it did over 75 years ago.
